title: CodeGate: Open Source Tool Secures AI Coding Assistants
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: AI-generated code is vulnerable to attack. Craig McLuckie, co-creator of Kubernetes, shared news about his company's newly open sourced project, a locally hosted layer of security for AI workflows.
cntitle: CodeGate：开源工具，保障AI编码助手安全
cndescription: AI生成的代码容易受到攻击。Craig McLuckie，Kubernetes的共同创建者，分享了他公司最新开源项目的消息，这是一个针对AI工作流的本地托管安全层。
